com.mapdigit.gis.raster

Class MapTileAbstractReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapdigit.gis.raster.MapTileAbstractReader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MapTileDownloader, MapTileStreamReader, VectorMapRenderer

    public abstract class MapTileAbstractReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for all map tile downloader/reader/render.

    © Copyright 2010 Guidebee Pty Ltd.

        public void setMapDownloadingListener(IReaderListener listener)
        Set downloader listener
        Parameters:
        listener -

      • getImage

        public abstract void getImage(int mtype,
            int x,
            int y,
            int zoomLevel)
        Get image at given location. when the reader is done, imageArray shall store the image byte array. imageArraySize is the actually data size. isImagevalid indicate the data is valid or not. normally this shall be an async call.
        Parameters:
        mtype - the map type of the map tile.
        x - the x index of the map tile.
        y - the y index of the map tile.
        zoomLevel - the zoom level of the map tile.

      • cancelRead

        public void cancelRead()
        a way app can cancel the reading process.
